alert.note: Alert for Central Coast Range of Western Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 25 at 3:08PM PST until February 26 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON PST SUNDAY ABOVE 1000 FEET... * WHAT...Wet snow expected above 1000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph later tonight into Sunday over the higher terrain. * WHERE...Central Coast Range of Western Oregon. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to noon PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Central Coast Range of Western Oregon
